line_1: She grasps the sabre, and she lights the pyre;
line_2: Her blazing torches flash the mounting fire,

line_1: Due to his friends upon the sacred pyre,
line_2: The pious Trojan ere he light the fire

line_1: To die spontaneous on the spicy pyre;
line_2: Where sainted BRACHMANS, sick of life, retire,

line_1: With tender Billet-doux he lights the Pyre,
line_2: And breaths three am'rous Sighs to raise the Fire.
